channel.title: Making requirements to enter a certain place! HELP!
channel.description: how do i make it so u need a certain lvl of atk and str to go into an area. like in runescape how u need ur atk and str to add up to 140 to get into the warrior guild. i would like to do the same thing. jus hav no idea how.some1 help

item.title: Making requirements to enter a certain place! HELP!
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

wtfnub:

where do i add it?

I was wondering if I should’ve included that answer in my first post, but I thought you could figure it out.
Anyway, put it wherever you want it used, and in the else block do what you want to do if the user has over 140 combined stats.

item.title: Making requirements to enter a certain place! HELP!
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

This is for needing 140 attack and strength combined to enter. Haven’t tested - doesn’t work, fix it as you go. It should, though.

levelReq = (playerLevel[playerAttack] + playerLevel[playerStrength]); // attack level + strength if(levelReq <= 140) sendMessage("You need 140 Attack + Strength combined to enter!"); else { // do whatever you want if atk + str is over or equal to 140. }

Read full topic
